test.instr: (:ins (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X red) (sort Y sofa))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X green) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (sort Y teapoy))) (:task (give human X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X white))) (:cons_not (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X white)))) )
test.nl: The door of the cupboard is opened. Close the cupboard. Put the red remotecontrol on the sofa. Put a bottle which is green in the cupboard. Put a cup on the teapoy. Give human a white book. Do not pick up a cup which is white.
